name: HTNRG - Compact View [Hattrick NewD]
description:
Use this style with Hattrick.
Makes the page more compact, reduces spaces between boxes.
You can find more info about my styles here : (http://nrgjack.altervista.org/tool/hmc/htmycss.php)
Check my other style  searching : HTNRG

------------------
